text: ohuma amaraniyayi. ohu hæra, vena kisima deviyeku næta. ebævin “(minisune!) oba sampurnayenma parisuddha manasin yutuva ohuva aradhana karanu mænava! (mandayat) næmadum pilivet siyalla ohutama ayatya. (sakala) lokayanda utpadanaya kara, posanaya kara, samraksanaya karana allahtama siyalu prasamsa ayatya” (yayida pavasanu mænava)
